edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.primitives

Class EvaluationPackage

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.primitives.EvaluationPackage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class EvaluationPackage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This package is being filled in the online protocol by p1 and sent to p2.

    This way, there is only one send instead of sending each member alone; This saves time.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Asaf Cohen)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getDecommitmentToY2InputKey

        public CmtCDecommitmentMessage getDecommitmentToY2InputKey(int circuitId,
                                                           int index,
                                                           int numWires,
                                                           int keySize,
                                                           int hashSize)
        Returns Decommitment to Y2 input keys, according to the given circuit id and the index.
        Parameters:
        circuitId - The circuit that the requested decommitment belongs.
        index - The index of the y2 input wire that the decommitment belongs.
        numWires - number of input wires.
        keySize - The size of each key, in bytes.
        hashSize - The size of the decommitment, in bytes.

      • getDecommitmentToXInputKey

        public CmtCDecommitmentMessage getDecommitmentToXInputKey(int circuitId,
                                                          int index,
                                                          int numWires,
                                                          int keySize,
                                                          int hashSize)
        Returns Decommitment to X input keys, according to the given circuit id and the index.
        Parameters:
        circuitId - The circuit that the requested decommitment belongs.
        index - The index of the x input wire that the decommitment belongs.
        numWires - number of input wires.
        keySize - The size of each key, in bytes.
        hashSize - The size of the decommitment, in bytes.

      • getDecommitmentToOutputKey

        public CmtCDecommitmentMessage getDecommitmentToOutputKey(int circuitId,
                                                          int numWires,
                                                          int keySize,
                                                          int hashSize)
        Returns Decommitment to output key, according to the given circuit id.
        Parameters:
        circuitId - The circuit that the requested decommitment belongs.
        numWires - number of output wires.
        keySize - The size of each key, in bytes.
        hashSize - The size of the decommitment, in bytes.

      • getXoredProof

        public byte[] getXoredProof(int wireIndex,
                            int circuitId,
                            int sigma,
                            int numCircuits,
                            int keySize)
        Returns the xored proof, according to the given circuit id, index and sigma.
        Parameters:
        wireIndex - The index of the wire that the proof belongs.
        circuitId - The circuit that the requested proof belongs.
        sigma - Indicates which proof to return (there are two proofs for each wire.)
        numCircuits - number of circuits.
        keySize - The size of each key, in bytes.

      • setHashedProofOfCheating
